panels.description:
The number of DS instances reporting as alive.
This calculation takes into account the dashboard filter selections for service and pod.
panels.title: Alive Instances

panels.description:
The number of DS instances reporting as healthy.
This calculation takes into account the dashboard filter selections for service and pod.
panels.title: Healthy Instances

panels.description:
The number of degraded indexes across all DS backends.
This calculation takes into account the dashboard filter selections for service and pod.
panels.title: Degraded Indexes

panels.description:
Total number of active LDAP persistent searches.
This calculation takes into account the dashboard filter selections for service and pod.
panels.title: Active Persistent-Searches

panels.description:
Total number of LDAP & HTTP requests processed over the displayed time range.
This calculation takes into account the dashboard filter selections for service and pod.
panels.title: Request Throughput

panels.description:
Total number of active LDAP & HTTP connections.
This calculation takes into account the dashboard filter selections for service and pod.
panels.title: Active Connections

panels.description: Total number of work requests currently queued waiting to be processed per DS instance. This calculation takes into account the dashboard filter selections for service and pod.
panels.title: Requests Waiting in Queue

panels.description:
The average time taken to process a request over the displayed time range.
This calculation takes into account the dashboard filter selections for service and pod.
panels.title: Average Request Service Time

panels.description:
Number of LDAP & HTTP requests processed over the displayed time range per pod.
This calculation takes into account the dashboard filter selections for service and pod.
panels.title: Request Throughput

panels.description:
Number of active LDAP & HTTP connections per cluster.
This calculation takes into account the dashboard filter selections for service and pod.
panels.title: Active Connections

panels.description:
Number of work requests currently queued waiting to be processed per DS instance.
This calculation takes into account the dashboard filter selections for service and pod.
panels.title: Requests Waiting in Queues

panels.description: The average time taken to process a request over the displayed time range. This calculation takes into account the dashboard filter selections for service and pod. Results are grouped by pod and outcome.
panels.title: Average Request Service Time

panels.description: Number of LDAP & HTTP requests processed over the displayed time range per cluster. This calculation takes into account the dashboard filter selections for service and pod. Results are grouped by pod.
panels.title: Request Throughput by Instance

panels.description: Number of LDAP & HTTP requests processed over the displayed time range per cluster. This calculation takes into account the dashboard filter selections for service and pod. Results are grouped by service and LDAP vs HTTP.
panels.title: Request Throughput by Protocol

panels.description: Number of LDAP & HTTP requests processed over the displayed time range per cluster. This calculation takes into account the dashboard filter selections for service and pod. Results are grouped by service and request type.
panels.title: Request Throughput by Request Type

panels.description: Number of LDAP & HTTP requests processed over the displayed time range per cluster. This calculation takes into account the dashboard filter selections for service and pod. Results are grouped by pod and outcome.
panels.title: Request Throughput by Outcome

panels.description: Max local delay in receiving replicated operations over the displayed time range.  This calculation takes into account the dashboard filter selections for service and pod.
panels.title: Max Replication Receive Delay

panels.description: Max local delay in replaying replicated operations over the displayed time range. This calculation takes into account the dashboard filter selections for service and pod.
panels.title: Max Replication Replay Delay

panels.description: Max number of entries for which an update operation has been received but not replayed.  This calculation takes into account the dashboard filter selections for service and pod.
panels.title: Max Entries Awaiting Update

panels.description: Number of replayed updates over the displayed time range.  This calculation takes into account the dashboard filter selections for service and pod.
panels.title: Replication Updates Replayed

panels.description: Current local delay in receiving replicated operations.  This calculation takes into account the dashboard filter selections for service and pod.
panels.title: Replication Receive Delay

panels.description: Current local delay in replaying replicated operations.  This calculation takes into account the dashboard filter selections for service and pod.
panels.title: Replication Replay Delay

panels.description: Number of work requests currently queued waiting to be processed per DS instance. This calculation takes into account the dashboard filter selections for service and pod.
panels.title: Requests Waiting in Queues

panels.description: Number of entries for which an update operation has been received but not replayed yet by this replica.  This calculation takes into account the dashboard filter selections for service and pod.
panels.title: Replication Updates Replayed

panels.description: Max number of remote updates received from the replication server but not replayed for any DS instance over the displayed time range.  This calculation takes into account the dashboard filter selections for service and pod.
panels.title: Inbound Queue Max

panels.description: Max number of local updates that are waiting to be sent to the replication server for any DS instance over the displayed time range. This calculation takes into account the dashboard filter selections for service and pod.
panels.title: Outbound Queue Max

panels.description: Number of replication conflicts unresolved over the displayed time range.  This calculation takes into account the dashboard filter selections for service and pod.
panels.title: Replication Conflicts Unresolved

panels.description: Number of replication conflicts resolved over the displayed time range. This calculation takes into account the dashboard filter selections for service and pod.
panels.title: Replication Conflicts Resolved

panels.description: This calculation takes into account the dashboard filter selections for service and pod.
panels.title: Entry Count

panels.description: Free space on each DS disk.  This calculation takes into account the dashboard filter selections for service and pod.
panels.title: Disk Free Space
